org.lenskit.bias

Class ItemBiasModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.bias.UserItemBiasModel
      • org.lenskit.bias.ItemBiasModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, BiasModel

    @Shareable
 @Immutable
 @DefaultProvider(value=ItemAverageRatingBiasModelProvider.class)
public class ItemBiasModel
extends UserItemBiasModel

    Bias model that provides global and item biases. The item biases are precomputed and are not updated based on new data added since the model builds

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
